page.title: 02HOUSING
page.content: Frant village has some very old and interesting houses and cottages.Many of them are very old and have red tile-hung walls,a typical Sussex style.There are terraced,semi- detatched and detatched cottages as well as big detatched houses. The High Street consists mainly of terraced cottages,some of them being former shops.It also has a church,a public house and a school. Some new private housing for retirement homes are currently being built(July 1985)There are not many other new houses in Frant. There are some Council houses in Warren Ridge,some of which have been bought by their tenants.A number of large houses of varying age overlook the village green.
